modules.description: Retrieves the API version string, establishes a database connection with a given identifier, and closes an active connection. It processes SQL queries against a database using a metadata object and returns structured IP geolocation data. The metadata type encapsulates connection details, while the IP record type holds lookup results.

Handles WebSocket connections and data retrieval with custom configuration. Processes string-based queries and returns structured JSON responses along with status codes. Used to fetch user-specific data and manage session states in real-time applications.

Provides functions to retrieve detailed geographic and network information from IP addresses using a file-based database. Works with IPv4 and IPv6 addresses, returning structured data including country, city, latitude, longitude, ISP, time zone, and ASN. Used in applications requiring location-based routing, user geolocation, or network analysis.

manages database and WebSocket interactions for IP geolocation, offering structured data retrieval through metadata and session-aware queries. It defines metadata for connection management and IP records for lookup results, along with JSON responses for real-time data. Users can execute SQL queries against a database or handle WebSocket-based user sessions. Examples include fetching geolocation details for an IP or maintaining real-time user state tracking.
